FABLIX_MOVIE_DETAILS: Collaborated with a teammate to develop a movie store website, allowing users to search 20,000+ movies under 300ms.
Utilized full-text search functions and the Levenshtein distance algorithm to implement auto-complete and fuzzy search.
Leveraged the Master-Slave replication, load balancer, and connection pooling to achieve a 30% enhancement in website stability and efficiency.
Integrated Google ReCaptcha on login pages to protect against abusive activities and enhance web security.
Imported 50,000+ entries from a raw XML into MySQL and reduced the parsing time by 90% after optimization.
